long_description: Stay dry and warm in single-digit temps in the Patagonia Snowbelle women's jacket, which is cozily insulated and stubbornly waterproof to ensure your mountain time is fun time. Two-layer construction boasts a polyester shell backed with a waterproof, breathable laminate to deliver all-weather protection. Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off melting snow to help keep you dry. Lightweight synthetic insulation provides warmth even when damp, compresses easily and features 90% recycled fibers (100g in body, 60g in hood and sleeves). Embedded RECCO(R) reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors, helping speed up the search for a buried avalanche victim. Soft polyester lining moves moisture away from your body and glides easily over base layers. Adjustable, removable and helmet-compatible hood has a laminated visor for optimal visibility in bad conditions. Patagonia Snowbelle insulated women's jacket features generous pit zips to dump excess heat quickly; articulated arms allow full range of motion. Low-profile powder skirt can be integrated with compatible Patagonia pants for full protection in deep powder. Zippered handwarmer pockets; one zip chest pocket with media cord routing; two internal drop-in pockets for goggles and gloves; one internal stash pocket. Adjustable cuffs and hem of the Patagonia Snowbelle insulated jacket can be cinched down to seal out cold weather; hem cords adjust from within pockets for easy adjustment.
